meanings.definition: A person one knows slightly, but who is not a close friend.
meanings.sent1: I have many acquaintances at work, but only a few close friends.
meanings.sent2: She waved to her acquaintances across the street.
meanings.sent3: My acquaintances always seem to show up when I least expect it.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of acquaintances, she found a true friend.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with acquaintances chatting and laughing.

meanings.sent1: His acquaintances with different cultures broadened his perspective.
meanings.sent2: She shared her acquaintances of the local history with the tourists.
meanings.sent3: His limited acquaintances with cooking led to a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her acquaintances with the stars made her feel small in the universe.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's acquaintances with new lands filled him with excitement.
